title: Analysis of graph: parametric functions part - c

content.question: Find the x- and y-coordinates for each critical point on the curve and identify each point as having a vertical or horizontal tangent.

frqParts.text: Find the x- and y-coordinates for each critical point on the curve and identify each point as having a vertical or horizontal tangent.
